ABd.caption: Base URL
ABd.doc: Your website base url. It is advised to use Dynamic Data > "Website home url" option (so that this workflow action works in both live and test mode).
ABd.name: baseurl

ABf.caption: Do Not Upload
ABf.doc: Check this box to DISABLE uploading the Merged PDF to your file manager / database. This will cause only the Data URI to generate (allowing you to download/view without having to store the file). Not recommended, unless you are experienced with handling Base64 Data URIs.
ABf.name: do_not_upload

ABh.caption: Merged File Name
ABh.doc: What to name the Merged File, including the ".pdf" extension.
ABh.name: merged_file_name

ABi.caption: PDF 1 URL
ABi.doc: First PDF to Merge (this PDF will come first).
ABi.name: pdf_1_url

ABj.caption: PDF 2 URL
ABj.doc: Second PDF to Merge (this PDF will come last).
ABj.name: pdf_2_url
